dialogues.name: Racer
dialogues.dialougeTxt: So this is the big leagues...

dialogues.name: Manager
dialogues.dialougeTxt: Yep, now you need to keep your eyes peeled instead of daydreaming the whole time.

dialogues.name: Manager
dialogues.dialougeTxt: It means that you need to remember that this is the Advanced Race and won't be as easy as the others.

dialogues.name: Manager
dialogues.dialougeTxt: This will be similar to the Beginner Race but now the opponets are better and the race track has short-cuts you need to look out for.

dialogues.name: Racer
dialogues.dialougeTxt: You take this too seriously, this will be a breeze!
